# isBatteryMonitoringEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the app can monitor the device’s battery.

## Declaration

```swift
var isBatteryMonitoringEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property defaults to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. To monitor the device’s battery, set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. This enables both the [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKInterfaceDevice/batteryLevel] and [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKInterfaceDevice/batteryState] properties.

## Reading Information About the Battery

- **batteryLevel**: The battery’s current percent charge.
- **batteryState**: The device’s battery state.
- **WKInterfaceDeviceBatteryState**: The battery’s charging state.
